meanings.definition: To analyze too much or too deeply.
meanings.sent1: Sometimes, I overanalyze my homework and end up confused.
meanings.sent2: I tend to overanalyze my decisions, which can be exhausting.
meanings.sent3: Don't overanalyze the joke; just enjoy it for what it is.
meanings.sent4: She tends to overanalyze situations, turning molehills into mountains.
meanings.sent5: Try not to overanalyze every detail; sometimes simplicity is best.

meanings.definition: To think about something too much or too deeply.
meanings.sent1: I tend to overanalyze my conversations long after they've ended.
meanings.sent2: When I overanalyze a problem, it becomes harder to find a solution.
meanings.sent3: He tends to overanalyze his dreams, searching for hidden meanings.
meanings.sent4: Overanalyzing the past can prevent us from moving forward.
meanings.sent5: It's easy to overanalyze situations, but sometimes we just need to trust our instincts.
